## TNodeSerializeOptions.dataSerializer property

Instruction on how to serialize internal data of [TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md)<!-- -->.

- By default, data is pass as is.

- If `false`<!-- -->, data becomes an empty object.

- For custom serializer, pass a function that receives a [TNode](./static-tree.tnode.md) as its parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dataSerializer?: false | ((node: TNode<D>) => any);
```
